right.item:
Indications

A leucine, isoleucine, and valine free protein substitute for use in the dietary management of Maple Syrup Urine Disease (MSUD) in individuals aged 8 years and older.

Product Features

  • Leucine, isoleucine, and valine free
  • Low volume
  • Contains the necessary mixture of amino acids, carbohydrates, minerals, trace elements and vitamins to meet the daily nutritional needs of this age group
  • Provides 60g of protein equivalent per 100g of powder
  • Unflavored powder with separate FlavourPac sachets available
  • Convenient and great tasting

Nutritional Information & Ingredients

Available for download at the end of this page.

Important Information

MSUD express must only be given to patients with proven Maple Syrup Urine Disease and under strict medical supervision. It is not recommended for children under 8 years of age or as a sole source of nutrition. The product does contain a source of phenylalanine.  MSUD express is not for parenteral use.

Dosage and Administration

  • Dosage of MSUD express should be determined by the clinician or dietitian
  • The daily protein requirement is given as MSUD express (100g is equivalent to 60g of protein).
  • Additional protein is provided from natural protein sources in medically prescribed quantities to provide leucine, isoleucine, and valine in controlled amounts, which is essential for normal development.
  • Foods high in carbohydrate and fat but low in protein should be provided as an energy source to supply the remainder of daily calories.
  • A supplement of isoleucine and valine is given if required (if plasma concentrations fall too low).

Guidelines for Preparation and Use

  1. Empty the contents of a sachet into a beaker (provided), and add a FlavourPac sachet if desired. Add cold water to about half way up the beaker (approximately 80ml).  Secure the lid and shake for 10 seconds.  Serve and drink immediately.
  2. Water or permitted drinks should be taken after the MSUD express. 
  3. Cover and refrigerate any unused formula. Use prepared formula within 24 hours.  Shake well before serving.

Storage

Store unopened sachets at room temperature. After opening, store tightly sealed sachet in a cool, dry place and use within one month. Avoid storing product in areas of extreme temperatures.

Availability
Product Number Description Packaging NDC Format Code
053534 MSUD express unflavored 30 x 25g sachets 50600-0535-34
